Speaks in voiceover about earnings, indicating awareness of financial matters.
Jokes openly and engages in casual conversation about insider trading with colleagues on the golf course, exhibiting friendly banter.

Knows exactly how many strokes Carlson is over during golf, indicating attentiveness and engagement with peers.
Offers a tip on stock trading openly to others, suggesting helpfulness and sharing.

Hits a perfect golf shot that impresses others, shows confidence and skill.
Knows exactly how many earnings they are over, demonstrating attention to detail and awareness.

Appears stunned and unable to process the layoffs news, showing limited emotional control or preparedness for the situation.

Fails to consider or communicate impact of his layoff on his wife, responding dumbly when asked about her job status.
